mapper.select: SELECT DOC_NO , USER_CODE -- 신청자 , DOC_TYPE -- 문서유형 , REQUEST_YMD -- 신청일 , SIGN_YMD -- 결재일 , RETURN_CAUSE -- 반려사유 FROM PM_DOCUMENT WHERE CMP_CODE = #{cmpCode} AND DOC_NO = #{docNo}

SELECT PD.DOC_NO , PD.USER_CODE , (SELECT USER_NAME FROM PM_USER A WHERE CMP_CODE=PD.CMP_CODE AND USER_CODE=PD.USER_CODE) USER_NAME , PD.DOC_TYPE , PD.DOC_STATUS , (SELECT CHILD_NAME FROM CODE_CHILD A WHERE PARENT_CODE='DOC002' AND CHILD_CODE=PD.DOC_STATUS) DOC_STATUS_NM , (SELECT CHILD_NAME FROM CODE_CHILD A WHERE PARENT_CODE='DOC001' AND CHILD_CODE=PD.DOC_TYPE) DOC_TYPE_NM , DATE_FORMAT(PD.REQUEST_YMD, '%Y년 %m월 %d일 %H:%i') REQUEST_YMD , DATE_FORMAT(PD.SIGN_YMD, '%Y년 %m월 %d일 %H:%i') SIGN_YMD , PD.RETURN_CAUSE , (SELECT CHILD_NAME FROM CODE_CHILD A WHERE PARENT_CODE='LVE001' AND CHILD_CODE=PDL.LEAVE_TYPE) LEAVE_TYPE , (SELECT CHILD_NAME FROM CODE_CHILD A WHERE PARENT_CODE='LVE002' AND CHILD_CODE=PDL.DAY_TYPE) DAY_TYPE , CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(PDL.START_DAY, '%Y.%m.%d') , ' ~ ' , DATE_FORMAT(PDL.END_DAY, '%Y.%m.%d')) LEAVE_DAY , PDL.LEAVE_CNT , PDL.REMARK , (SELECT SIGN_SEQ FROM PM_DOCUMENT_SIGN A WHERE CMP_CODE=PD.CMP_CODE AND DOC_NO=PD.DOC_NO AND SIGN_USER=#{userCode}) SIGN_SEQ , (SELECT MAX(SIGN_SEQ) FROM PM_DOCUMENT_SIGN A WHERE CMP_CODE=PD.CMP_CODE AND DOC_NO=PD.DOC_NO) LAST_SEQ FROM PM_DOCUMENT PD LEFT OUTER JOIN PM_DOCUMENT_LEAVE PDL ON PD.CMP_CODE = PDL.CMP_CODE AND PD.DOC_NO = PDL.DOC_NO WHERE PD.CMP_CODE = #{cmpCode} AND PD.DOC_NO = #{docNo}

SELECT PDS.CMP_CODE , PDS.DOC_NO , PDS.SIGN_SEQ , PDS.SIGN_USER , (SELECT CONCAT(USER_NAME, '(', USER_CODE, ')') FROM PM_USER A WHERE CMP_CODE=PDS.CMP_CODE AND USER_CODE=PDS.SIGN_USER) SIGN_NAME , DATE_FORMAT(PDS.SIGN_YMD, '%Y.%m.%d. %H:%i') SIGN_YMD , (SELECT CHILD_NAME FROM CODE_CHILD A WHERE PARENT_CODE='DOC002' AND CHILD_CODE=PDS.DOC_STATUS) DOC_STATUS FROM PM_DOCUMENT_SIGN PDS WHERE PDS.CMP_CODE = #{cmpCode} AND PDS.DOC_NO = #{docNo} ORDER BY PDS.SIGN_SEQ

SELECT A.USER_CODE , A.USER_NAME , B.CREATE_DAY , B.USE_DAY , B.REMAIN_DAY FROM PM_USER A LEFT OUTER JOIN PM_USER_LEAVE B ON A.CMP_CODE = B.CMP_CODE AND A.USER_CODE = B.USER_CODE WHERE A.CMP_CODE = #{cmpCode} AND A.USER_CODE = #{userCode} AND B.CREATE_YM = (SELECT MAX(CREATE_YM) FROM PM_USER_LEAVE A WHERE CMP_CODE = #{cmpCode} AND USER_CODE = #{userCode})
SELECT CONCAT(SUBSTR(DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y%m%d'),3), LPAD(CONVERT(IFNULL(MAX(DOC_NO),0)+1, CHAR),'4','0') ) AS DOC_NO FROM PM_DOCUMENT WHERE SUBSTR(DOC_NO,1,6) = SUBSTR(DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y%m%d'),3)
SELECT CONCAT(YYYY,MMDD) AS YYYYMMDD FROM shxdb.CALENDAR_HOLIDAY WHERE YYYY = DATE_FORMAT(CURDATE(),'%Y')

SELECT PSU.USER_CODE , PU.USER_NAME , IF(IFNULL(PD.DEPT_MANAGER,'N') = 'N', false, true) MANAGER -- 부서장 , PU.JOB_POS , (SELECT CHILD_NAME FROM CODE_CHILD WHERE PARENT_CODE=PC.POS_CATEGORY AND CHILD_CODE=PU.JOB_POS) JOB_NAME -- 직책 FROM PM_SIGN_USER PSU INNER JOIN PM_USER PU ON PSU.CMP_CODE = PU.CMP_CODE AND PSU.USER_CODE = PU.USER_CODE INNER JOIN PM_COMPANY PC ON PSU.CMP_CODE = PC.CMP_CODE LEFT OUTER JOIN PM_DEPT PD ON PU.CMP_CODE = PD.CMP_CODE AND PU.USER_CODE = PD.DEPT_MANAGER AND PU.DEPT_CODE = PD.DEPT_CODE WHERE PSU.CMP_CODE = #{cmpCode} AND PSU.DOC_TYPE = #{docType} AND PSU.DEPT_CODE = (SELECT DEPT_CODE FROM PM_USER WHERE CMP_CODE=#{cmpCode} AND USER_CODE=#{userCode}) AND PSU.PART_CODE = (SELECT PART_CODE FROM PM_USER WHERE CMP_CODE=#{cmpCode} AND USER_CODE=#{userCode}) ORDER BY IF(MANAGER = true, 1, 0), PU.JOB_POS DESC
